name: Cascade Cafe
description:
Join a group of friends as they play a relaxing path building boardgame, inspired by games of the Suujin Taisen genre. Place your tiles to line them up and connect their bridges, then combine their values to build unique sequences.



  • Play through the main story as Nymo, a new arrival to a local cafe. Meet the regulars as they teach you how to play Cascade, where each day uncovers new strategies to explore.
  • Learn each characters abilities and control the board state. Collect items and push tiles around the board, change their values or place hidden traps.
  • Play Online 1v1 against friends.
  • Play Offline against a bots to practice.
  • Lofi chillhop soundtrack by Puurple Cat.
  • Challenge Modes for extra puzzles - Coming soon!
